title: Pharmacist Continuing Education: E-Learning-Based Course for Enhancing Drug Information Communication Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: 20-minute SCORM 2004-compliant LMS modules in a BYOD environment, supported by real-time tracking systems and collaboration tools.

learning_goals: Learners can convey core information with 80% accuracy when explaining drug interactions to elderly patients
Learners can perform drug side-effect case analyses at least three times per week through e-learning modules
Learners can create discussion records for at least two medication management scenarios with peer pharmacists using collaboration features in the LMS
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
